description: This table contains Continued Care and Services Coordination completion information.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: DP_COORD_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The coordination type for Continued Care and Services Coordination.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Destination


Durable Medical Equipment


Dialysis/Infusion


Home Medical Care


Community Resources

columns.name: DP_COORD_COMPLETE_YN
columns.description:
This column indicates whether Continued Care and Services Coordination has been completed for this coordination type.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: DP_COORD_NOT_REQ_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
Reason for completing Continued Care and Services Coordination without selecting any services.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Patient will return home

columns.name: DP_COORD_NOT_REQ_RSN_CMT
columns.description: Comment appended to the reason for completing Continued Care and Services Coordination without selecting any services.
